Class javachart.chart.HiLoClose 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----javachart.chart.Bar
           |
           +----javachart.chart.HiLoClose
public class HiLoClose
extends Bar
Creates a chart element that combine a position (X value, usually a date), and 3 Y values (usually high, low, and closing prices).

HiLoClose(Dataset[], AxisInterface, AxisInterface, Plotarea)

doBar(Graphics, double, int, int, boolean)
Overrides Bar to draw HiLoClose bars instead of conventional bar chart columns
doBarLabel(Graphics, double, int, int)
Overrides Bar to eliminate bar labels
doDBar(Graphics, double, int, int, boolean)
Overrides Bar to eliminate 3-D effects for HiLoClose charts

HiLoClose 
  public HiLoClose(Dataset d[],
                   AxisInterface xAx,
                   AxisInterface yAx,
                   Plotarea subplot)
Parameters:
d - list of datasets to manage
xAx - X axis to scale this data
yAx - Y axis to scale this data
subplot - Plotarea to draw this element on
